In June of this year I replied to a post regarding a hardware expansion. I =
sent $500 with the understanding the device would be available shortly afte=
r assembly. In October I enquired what the status and was assured it was be=
ing completed. After several inquiries that were not answered I decided to =
(without mentioning a name) make others aware. At this point I don't expect=
 either the hardware nor my $500. Just my experience.
Sent from Yahoo Mail =
on Android 
 
  On Wed, Dec 7, 2016 at 1:53 PM, Michael Di Salvo msdconsult=
ing@... [ballyalley]<ballyalley@yahoogroups.com> wrote:   =C2=A0   
Y=
eah agreed, what happened? =C2=A0

You cant just toss an accusation like th=
at out there on an established group like this without the whole story Chuc=
k.
-Michael=C2=A0

Sent from Yahoo Mail on Android 
 
  =C2=A0   

What hap=
pened?

      From: "chuckzellers@... [ballyalley]" <ballyalley@yahoo=
groups.com>
 To: ballyalley@yahoogroups.com 
 Sent: Tuesday, December 6, 20=

 Subject: [ballyalley] Hardware

om here. I'm out $500. ;)
